original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.

enhanced_versions:
This role offers a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, where you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for developing new processes and implementing technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and optimization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate complex business needs into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover insights.
- Spearhead initiatives to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the application of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and devise effective solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Proven ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for a diverse audience.
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with a strong understanding of database management and data manipulation.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to drive process optimization and innovation.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management.
- Demonstrable expertise in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements.

Required Experience:
- Hands-on experience in the implementation and deployment of machine learning and AI-powered solutions.

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management.
- Proven track record of working in the vehicle configuration space, with a strong understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing database querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software.
- Experience in working with [mention specific system] and its configuration management tools and processes.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools, such as Jira, Trello, or Microsoft Project.

This role presents an exciting opportunity to blend your business acumen and technical expertise, where you will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at optimal efficiency. As a configuration specialist, you will be responsible for developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive process improvements and enhance system performance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate complex business needs into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining detailed configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and thoroughly testing new configurations, and proactively troubleshooting and resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Spearhead initiatives to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the application of industry best practices.
- Participate in comprehensive testing of configurations to ensure they meet all requirements and function as expected, actively engaging in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain meticulous documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate seamlessly with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and devise effective, data-driven solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Proven ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for a diverse audience.
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with a strong understanding of database management and data manipulation techniques.
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts, and the ability to apply them to drive process optimization and innovation.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in the application of Agile methodologies in software development and project management.
- Demonstrable expertise in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements.

Required Experience:
- Hands-on experience in the implementation and deployment of machine learning and AI-powered solutions within a complex business environment.

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in software development and project management.
- Proven track record of successful collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions in the vehicle configuration space.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing database querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software.
- Experience in working with [mention specific system] and its configuration management tools and processes.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools, such as Jira, Trello, or Microsoft Project.
